solution_line_template: If there were beacon towers every {tower_interval} kilometers along the {great_wall_length} kilometer length of the Great Wall, then there were {great_wall_length}/{tower_interval}=<<{great_wall_length}/{tower_interval}={num_beacon_towers}>>{num_beacon_towers} beacon towers.

If every tower had {soldiers_per_tower} soldiers, then there were a total of {num_beacon_towers}*{soldiers_per_tower}=<<{num_beacon_towers}*{soldiers_per_tower}={total_soldiers}>>{total_soldiers} soldiers in beacon towers along the Great Wall.
